mapper.select: select DISTINCT a.* from org a LEFT JOIN org_user b on b.org_id = a.id where !a.is_deleted and !b.is_deleted and !b.is_disabled and a.org_name = #{name} and b.username = #{username} ;

SELECT ou.`id`,o.`org_name`,ou.`username`,ou.`realname`,ou.`handphone`, ou.`email`,ou.`position`,ou.`title`,ou.`address`, ou.`postcode`,ou.`proxy`,ou.`progress` FROM `org` o LEFT JOIN `org_user` ou ON o.`id`=ou.`org_id` where ou.is_deleted = 0 and ou.is_proxy_upload=1
and o.org_name like concat(concat('%',#{orgName}),'%')
and ou.username like concat(concat('%',#{username}),'%')
and ( ou.`realname` like concat(concat('%',#{realname}),'%') OR ou.username LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{realname}),'%') )
and ou.progress = #{progress}
order by ou.sort

SET SESSION group_concat_max_len=102400; /*group_concat默认长度1024，部分学校名称被截断，故加长*/ SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(o.`id`) id, GROUP_CONCAT(o.`org_name`)org_name, o.`area_id`, o.`parent_id`, GROUP_CONCAT(o.`org_type_id`)org_type_id, ar.`area_name` FROM
`material_org` mo LEFT JOIN `org` o ON mo.`org_id` = o.`id`
`org` o
LEFT JOIN `org_type` ot ON o.`org_type_id` = ot.`id` LEFT JOIN `area` ar ON o.`area_id` = ar.`id` WHERE 1=1
and o.`org_name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{orgName},'%'))
AND mo.`material_id`= #{materialId}
GROUP BY o.`area_id` ORDER BY o.`area_id`,o.`id` ASC;

SET SESSION group_concat_max_len=102400; /*group_concat默认长度1024，部分学校名称被截断，故加长*/ SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(o.`id`) id, GROUP_CONCAT(o.`org_name`)org_name, o.`area_id`, o.`parent_id`, GROUP_CONCAT(o.`org_type_id`)org_type_id, ar.`area_name` FROM
